name: mies
title: Mies at the MoCA
description: A poster advertising an exhibition of the work of Ludwig Mies van der Rohe at the Museum of Contemporary Art in Los Angeles
completed: Completed as part of a poster series exercise at BU in 2006

name: bucnn
title: Boston University CNN Brochure
description: Cover for information brochure about the Boston Univeristy Center for Nanoscience and Nanobiotechnology
completed: Distributed at a nanoscience conference hosted by BU in April 2008

name: epson
title: Epson paper packaging redesign
description: Part of a series of redesigned packaging products for the Epson paper company
completed: Compeleted as an exercise in packaging design at Boston University in 2006

name: brassring
title: BrassRing URC website
description: A redesign of an online user information and support center for BrassRing, a Waltham-based human resources training company. Bought by the company along with three print ads (see thumbnails).
completed: Completed in 2005 during a design internship at BrassRing; winner of their redesign competition

name: btc
title: Boston Theater Company logo
description: A logo redesign for the Boston Theater Company, a local organization specializing in creative, modern Shakespearean productions. Also see posters for BTC productions of MacBeth and Othello.

name: monster
title: The Monster and Me
description: Cover illustration and design for a collection of children's stories by Erin Aults
completed: Published in chapbook form at Susquehana University in May 2000

name: archaeology
title: Archaeology
description: A cover design for my master's thesis in creative writing, a collection of poetry
completed: Published by BU in May 2003

name: extinct
title: extinct
description: One of a series of concept pieces created during a study of the theme of absence and negative space
completed: Completed at BU in 2006

name: badash
title: Bad Ash
description: Poster for a band gig in a local pub
completed: August 2007

name: doriangray
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: Book cover redesign for the classic novel by Oscar Wilde. The story involves a young man who sells his soul for beauty, descending into an ugly life of corruption, drugs, and murder while his physical appearance remains handsome and perfect
completed: Completed as part of a project at BU in 2007

name: astronomy
title: Astronomy Unplugged
description: A poster advertising and annual concert organized by the BU Astronomy department and featuring Blues, Jazz, Folk, and Rock performances by department members. (I sang with Secret Aries, a small folk group. We rocked.)

name: emmrem
title: EMMREM Logo
description: Logo redesign for the Earth-Moon-Mars Radiation Exposure Module, a NASA-funded mission to measure radiation levels in the Earth-Moon-Mars interplanetary environment in order to increase the safety of astronauts
completed: Completed in 2004

name: bodyrejuvenations
title: Body Rejuvenations website
description: Website design for a Boston-area aesthetic and laser clinic
completed: Completed November 2007

name: upclose
title: Up Close and Personal
description: A photographic essay exploring the hidden beauty of everyday things. The cover shows a closeup of my own eye (if you look real close, you can see my soul!). Thumbnails from left to right show the cover page, a hair varrette, liquid soap, a bottle of shampoo, nail clippers, a hairbrush, and a tube of lip gloss
completed: Self-published as a personal book in Spring 2006

name: strongbody
title: Strong Body, Strong Will
description: A series of t-shirt designs for the Boston University Fitness and Recreation Center
completed: Completed in 2006

name: emotion
title: e-motion logo
description: Logo for e-motion, an ergonomic office furniture company that specializes in vertically adjustable desks and work surfaces
completed: Completed as an exercise in corporate design at BU in 2005

name: migrate
title: Migrate
description: A series of concept pieces on disappearance and the absence of the subject, explored through the vehicle of bird migration
completed: Completed in Spring 2006

name: sushi
title: Sushi Party Invitation
description: Made for some friends of mine who were way too into sushi
completed: August 2006

name: prostars
title: Prostars Logo
description: Logo design for a National Science Foundation grant, PROgrams in STem Academic Retention and Success, that aims to boost student participation in areas of science technology, engineering, and mathematics
completed: Completed in February 2008

name: mfathesis
title: MFA Thesis Project
description: A series of photographs and posters designed to build awareness of homelessness and promote the boston rescue mission, intended for public transportation venues. My goal was to combat the everyday commuter's feeling of detachment towards social issues and bring the very real problem of homelessness into personal focus
completed: Part of an installation exhibited at BU in Spring 2007

name: macbeth
title: MacBeth
description: Poster for a Boston Theatre Company production of MacBeth
completed: Completed as part of a BU project in 2005

name: othello
title: Othello
description: Poster for a Boston Theatre Company production of Othello
completed: Completed as part of a BU project in Fall 2005

name: skypoems
title: Sky Poems
description: Book cover design for a collection of poetry by Sarah Farbo
completed: Published in chapbook form at Susquhanna University in May 2000

name: wwii
title: WWII Virtual Scrapbook
description: An interactive site in the form of a flippable scrapbook full of photos, letters, and diary entries from the WWII era
completed: Completed in May 2008

name: firstwords
title: First Words
description: Cover design for a student literary magazine at the Ohio State University
completed: Completed Spring 2002
